parity_gates.name: Unit tests
parity_gates.evidence: 100 unit tests in fj-lax: 14 arithmetic_scalar, 6 arithmetic_vector, 10 transcendental, 12 comparison, 8 reduction, 10 tensor_ops, 6 broadcasting, 4 type_promotion, 10 error_paths, 16 nan_inf_ieee754, 11 property_tests, 1 schema_contract

parity_gates.name: Oracle/differential conformance
parity_gates.evidence: 25 oracle tests covering all primitive categories: arithmetic (10), transcendental (6), comparison (4), reduction (4), shape_ops (5), dot (2) — all hand-verified against JAX documented behavior

parity_gates.name: Adversarial validation
parity_gates.evidence: 12 adversarial tests: incompatible shapes (4), arity violations (3), unsupported primitives (2), large tensor (1), inverted slice (1), double inferred dims (1)

parity_gates.name: Metamorphic properties
parity_gates.evidence: 8 metamorphic tests: add/mul identity, neg involution, exp-log inverse, transpose involution, reduce_sum manual match, abs idempotent, max-min agreement

parity_gates.name: Performance targets
parity_gates.evidence: All 10 benchmarks baselined. Dispatch overhead=11ns (<50ns target). Add scalar=11ns. Add 1K=17.6us. Dot 100=596ns. Reshape 1K=570ns.

parity_gates.name: E2E scenarios
parity_gates.evidence: 10 E2E scenarios: all-primitives-scalar, rank1/rank2 tensor, 3 composition chains (add-mul-reduce, exp-log roundtrip, reshape-transpose-reshape), NaN/Inf edges, NaN comparison, error paths, broadcasting pipeline

parity_gates.name: Property tests
parity_gates.evidence: 11 proptest property tests: commutativity (add/mul/max/min), neg involution, abs non-negative, reshape roundtrip, reduce_sum/prod manual match, eq reflexive, add-sub inverse (256+ cases each)

parity_gates.name: Risk analysis
parity_gates.evidence: 10-invariant risk note. 12-threat security matrix. 30-row compatibility envelope. 10 fail-closed rules. Zero unsafe code (#![forbid(unsafe_code)]). Known divergences documented: round() banker's vs half-away, Gather/Scatter unsupported, limited broadcasting.

known_issues: Gather/Scatter primitives return Unsupported error (high risk — programs using these will fail)
round(2.5)=3 (Rust half-away-from-zero) vs JAX banker's rounding round(2.5)=2
broadcast_in_dim: scalar-tensor only, no full NumPy broadcasting
Reductions support single-axis only (no multi-axis reduction)
